languages.text: "Каждый наш шаг опасен. Но мы продолжаем ходить. Если совершать погружение верно, то ритуал довольно прост. И почти безболезненный".
"Every step we take is dangerous, yet still we choose to walk. If done correctly, the ritual is simple and will cause you little pain."
languages.original_text: "Каждый наш шаг опасен. Но мы продолжаем ходить. Если совершать погружение верно, то ритуал довольно прост. И почти безболезненный".

traits.locale_text: "Our every step is dangerous. And yet on we walk. If you sink correctly, the ritual is simple. And almost painless."
"Our every step is dangerous. And yet on we walk. If you sink correctly, the ritual is simple. And almost painless."
"Every step we take is dangerous, yet still we choose to walk. If done correctly, the ritual is simple and will cause you little pain."
"Every step we take is dangerous, yet still we choose to walk. If done correctly, the ritual is simple and will cause you little pain."
"Every step we take is dangerous, yet still we choose to walk. If done correctly, the ritual is simple and will cause you little pain."

languages.text: « Chaque pas que nous faisons est dangereux, mais cela ne nous empêche pas de continuer à avancer. Ce rituel est très simple et presque indolore lorsqu'on l'effectue correctement. »
languages.original_text: "Every step we take is dangerous, yet still we choose to walk. If done correctly, the ritual is simple and will cause you little pain."

traits.locale_text: « Chaque pas que nous faisons est dangereux, mais cela ne nous empêche pas de continuer à avancer. Ce rituel est très simple et presque indolore lorsqu'on l'effectue correctement. »

languages.text: «Cada uno de nuestros pasos es peligroso, pero aun así decidimos caminar. Si se ejecuta correctamente, el ritual es sencillo y provoca poco dolor».
languages.original_text: "Every step we take is dangerous, yet still we choose to walk. If done correctly, the ritual is simple and will cause you little pain."

traits.locale_text: «Cada uno de nuestros pasos es peligroso, pero aun así decidimos caminar. Si se ejecuta correctamente, el ritual es sencillo y provoca poco dolor».

languages.text: “我们走出的每一步都很危险，但我们依然选择继续走下去。只要正确执行，这个仪式实际上很简单，几乎不会给你带来任何痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "Every step we take is dangerous, yet still we choose to walk. If done correctly, the ritual is simple and will cause you little pain."

traits.locale_text: “我们走出的每一步都很危险，但我们依然选择继续走下去。只要正确执行，这个仪式实际上很简单，几乎不会给你带来任何痛苦。”

languages.text: 「全ての一歩は危ないのに、私達は歩くことを選ぶ。正しくやれば、儀式は簡単で痛みも少ししかありません」
languages.original_text: "Every step we take is dangerous, yet still we choose to walk. If done correctly, the ritual is simple and will cause you little pain."

traits.locale_text: 「全ての一歩は危ないのに、私達は歩くことを選ぶ。正しくやれば、儀式は簡単で痛みも少ししかありません」

languages.text: "Jeder Schritt, den wir tun, ist gefährlich, und doch gehen wir. Wenn das Ritual richtig ausgeführt wird, ist es simpel und wird Euch kaum Schmerzen bereiten."
languages.original_text: "Every step we take is dangerous, yet still we choose to walk. If done correctly, the ritual is simple and will cause you little pain."

traits.locale_text: "Jeder Schritt, den wir tun, ist gefährlich, und doch gehen wir. Wenn das Ritual richtig ausgeführt wird, ist es simpel und wird Euch kaum Schmerzen bereiten."
